timeline.bodyText: Should we point out that this function is registered under the pg_catalog schema?
timeline.author: mfussenegger
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2402,6 +2402,33 @@ Example:
     +--------------+
     SELECT 1 row in set (... sec)
 
+.. _version:
+
+``version``

replies.bodyText:
Maybe yes, although we don't describe this for the other system information functions like e.g. pg_typeof, current_schema etc.
Shall we may note this there as well?
replies.author: seut

replies.bodyText: Not sure. Also fine for me to omit it.
replies.author: mfussenegger

timeline.message:
Add `version()` system information function.

This function is used by some PostgreSQL protocol based clients.

Add `version()` system information function.

This function is used by some PostgreSQL protocol based clients.
